channel.title: BuF Classics
channel.description: Threads that have always held a special place in our hearts here at BuF. Funny, sad, and just plain bizzare... These are all classics.

item.title: Motivation and Team Pride
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morety)
item.dc:creator: Morety
item.content:encoded:
Motivation and Team Pride. (Pic's inside)

The names have been blocked out to protect the innocent

The next few screenshots will show you how to become a clan captain and motivate your team. You will see how capitalization and repetitiveness can help them understand you better, and make them want to try harder.

These screenies were taken during a match where I was still playing...kind of.

The missing line says "Now listen or be kicked" "Got it?"...

Motivation and Team Pride

item.title: TWD HAS A GIRLFRIEND!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jackal)
item.dc:creator: Jackal
item.content:encoded:
It's true. We are happy for him.

For years TWD has lusted for a womans touch. Now, he has one and can't keep his hands off her. Since they are getting married soon, we all wish him luck from BuF.

item.title: Incredible hidden easter egg in DM-Peak
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lunatic)
item.dc:creator: Lunatic
item.content:encoded: I couldn't believe it! I was bopping around Dm-peak, when all of a sudden I fell off one of the narrow bridges and began to fall. I pushed back hard on the mouse and managed to land on a small ledge where I proceeded to walk right through the wall. I entered a small brick room where I saw two homosexual Nali-aliens feverishly giving each other reach-arounds and hot-carls until they were blue in the face. They then transformed into tiny silver lobsters and sang Christmas songs. Check it out!

item.title: When Vin Diesel awakens...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morety)
item.dc:creator: Morety
item.content:encoded:
it's spring time again.

He alone was responsible for Hitler's downfall.

The Grand Canyon was invented when Vin Diesel dropped a penny down a gopher hole.

item.title: ode to the banhammeren
item.author: invalid@example.com (AriTheDog)
item.dc:creator: AriTheDog
item.content:encoded:
lost are the glory days
of valor and honor
and angry angry ice

now there is only erections
a swarthy erection
connected at the hip
balls deep in banhammeren

angry angry ice
please fix this injustice
bring back the glory days
"but that's just me."

item.author: invalid@example.com (PsychoMoggieBagpuss)
item.dc:creator: PsychoMoggieBagpuss
item.content:encoded:
As we lost the other one I have dedicated this thread to its honour.

You know the drill, trawl Crimewatch and help show the world that buffers are not only ut players, but world famous tv/movie/rock/video game stars.

I don't have a copy of the first image that started this thread (the tool/dwayne dibbly one) so Arturus, hurry up and post it.

And without further ado here is my collection.

BU's own farterator, come...

Spot The Difference!!!

item.title: BuF Comic thread!
item.author: invalid@example.com (tool)
item.dc:creator: tool
item.content:encoded:
Draw your own crappy comics, it needs to be BuF related though, that is the only requirement. Ari, Swarthy, and myself are going at it right now with this. It is pretty stupid, but a lot of fun. Use MS Paint or photoshop and do a real crappy job with a mouse and you get extra bonus points, or maybe a kick in the balls, it is a totally random award.

I'll start it off by posting a comic about myself and myr. Myr is just gonna "luv" this!!!

Ooh and keep it friendly, we don't want to...

BuF Comic thread!

item.title: A Challenge to the OT forumers.
item.author: invalid@example.com (PsychoMoggieBagpuss)
item.dc:creator: PsychoMoggieBagpuss
item.content:encoded:
I don't know about you guys but I'm pretty bored of the ads flashing above the site. Same old same old.

So I am starting a competition.

I want all of you guys with your 1337 photoshop skills to come up with gif banners that will make me (and the rest of the population of these forums) laugh, smirk, or even occasionly cringe.

Possible topics include items like "Tool. The other white meat",
"Goddamn it Worf, shut up already", "TWD, really, you're not a dragon" or even "Beerbaron,...

A Challenge to the OT forumers.

item.title: Hairstyle continuation: *car horn* *slice* ARRGGHHH
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeeperShade)
item.dc:creator: DeeperShade
item.content:encoded:
Were the sounds made a short while ago as i was bathing (i do the.. shavy bits in the bath.. tis easier).

Car went past outside and for some reason slammed its horn on.
I jumped a mile. I was also shaving at the time.

*slice*

Im now in an awful amount of pain and have decided not to shave anymore. Its getting to be more hastle than its worth.

item.title: TWD
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morety)
item.dc:creator: Morety
item.content:encoded:
Remember how the other night you were talking about how your sister would shower behind you when you were on the computer in the morning. Well, that's got me thinking.

Would you be interested in a free web-cam?

I'm sure all the people here would love to buy you one to set up on your computer. We'd like to chat with you face to face.

item.title: My bf's porn folder
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sapphire Nights)
item.dc:creator: Sapphire Nights
item.content:encoded:
I was poking around in his computer yesterday (I installed Wolfinstein) and found a directory called c:\windows\other. I thought, I never saw a directory in windows called "other" So I opened it and found 2 gig of .jpg's. Then I started clicking on them and opening them. And low and behold I found down and dirty porn.

He came back into the room and saw what I was doing and he got very nervous. He gave me so much grief about the guy that sent me nudies. So I pretended to be offended to...

My bf's porn folder

item.title: Asia Carrera's buttkicking 1.4Ghz neon rig!

item.dc:creator: Kray
item.content:encoded:
lemme show off some more pics of my new neon 1.4ghz Athlon buttkicker! (envision me opening my virtual wallet, and 10,000 baby pics of my computers unfold down to the floor, hehe!!) .... The clear case, mobo, & soundcard were a gift from my pal Steve over at Hypothermia hardware, but the case is custom made, and comes with NOTHING inside, no racks for drives...
Click to expand...
Asia Carrera's buttkicking 1.4Ghz neon rig!
